title: FS T205 Broadleaf Green - Jimmy Austin ~Sold
author: Seiklis

posts.post_title: FS T205 Broadleaf Green - Jimmy Austin ~Sold
posts.post_content:
Beautiful example of a hard T205 back asking $315 for it. Raw but shows very well with a slight print error on the G
